data.text:
@greg_travis Idiots at impact. Are there any national papers or magazines who’ve reported on long covid?

https://t.co/D5EcXLpgL5

@greg_travis This report is maddening!  It certainly seemed suspicious that our country was dropping mask mandates at an alarming rate!  We will not rid ourself of this virus with this sort of thinking.  Thanks for sharing.  Explains a lot.

@greg_travis @Debs_Kropotkin They couldn’t even manage to pass legislation mandating sick days for American workers. Not even unpaid sick days. More homeless, more uninsured, no minimum wage increases. #winning!
@greg_travis Americans are “worn out?” Apparently we’re a country of thin-skinned cry babies.
@greg_travis @Debs_Kropotkin Second time around most on the left have swallowed the talking points https://t.co/9szw6xUE3k
@greg_travis I'm feeling so cared for by both political parties now....

@greg_travis Truly costly part is lives devastated & lives lost.  Tragic part is anyone paying *anything* for crap advice & that any leaders "buy" into it.  Not disagreeing.  Just feeling angry.  Strategists are strategizing against us & leaders are buying it.
